page.title: 14ST.JAMES'CHURCH,CARDINGTON
page.content: The incumbent at St.James'Church, Cardington has 3 other parishes to serve.The church is cared for by 2 churchwardens and a verger. There are 5 services a month,plus special celebrations.The most popular service being the 1st Sunday of the month at 9.30am,which is followed by refresh- ments served from the vestry. The supporting groups of the church are:- a strong mixed choir,a lively Sunday School with 20 children taught by 3 voluntary teachers. Our Mother's Union membership is 22. There are 112 parishioners on the Electoral Roll. The average attendance at services is 35. We are looking forward, and working hard for a purpose-built 2 manual organ being installed before the end of 1985 at a cost of around Â£15,000.
